version_description: This version contains fixes for iOS 8!

The most complete radar available in the App Store!
- fixed update bug
- better weather coverage

Hurricane coverage improvements
Bug Fixes

Split Screen on iOS9. Use this app simultaneously with other apps!

- iOS9 Split Screen Full Support
- Faster loading weather forecast
- Better performance on iOS7 and iOS8

Split Screen on iOS9. Use this app simultaneously with other apps!

- iOS9 Split Screen Full Support
- Faster loading weather forecast
- Better performance on iOS7 and iOS8
World Radar is now optimised for iPad Pro!

The most complete rain map available!

***** Keep up with the World Wide Weather! *****

-- THE BEST RADAR APP AVAILABLE --
• We've fixed some small problems to improve the stability & performance of the App.

-- THE BEST RADAR APP AVAILABLE --
• Check out our new App Preview Video!
• We’ve updated the weather services to deliver more accurate forecast and radar information

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please email us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.
If you are happy with this update, please let us know by rating and reviewing us in the App Store!

-- THE BEST RADAR APP AVAILABLE --
• Premium Membership is Now Available! Ad-Free, Extended Rain Radar & Premium Customer Support.
• The charts time button was missing. We've fixed this! Always take the weather with you!

-- THE BEST RADAR APP AVAILABLE --
• We've done some performance improvements to the weather service so the forecasts and radars are even more accurate

As always, we appreciate your feedback. Please keep sharing your experience to feedback@impalastudios.com
Do you love our app? Please rate and review us in the App Store!

• Improved Rain Radar
• We’ve fixed some small bugs to improve the stability & performance of the app.

• We’ve updated the data security connections

We fixed a bug which for subscribed users caused:
• ads still showing

• Bug fix in the hurricane data, the quadrants on the hurricane layer were not updating in all circumstances
• We fixed the bug that caused you not being able to share the current weather conditions
• Other bug fixes that are not necessarily visible

• This version contains minor bug fixes

Thank you for your continued support! - We highly appreciate your feedback, so don’t hesitate to contact us at feedback@impalastudios.com with any suggestions or questions.
• We've fixed the snow and rain values; it's now showing the correct precipitation.

• We’ve fixed a crash occurring in the app while running on iOS 12
• We've added screenshots optimized for iPhone X
• We've added new Marketing material

Yes, we've improved the Hurricane Warnings!

We've fixed:
• Hurricane predicted path, it was not working. (white/grey path in the forecast)
• Hurricane Wind Quadrants -> it was expressed as speed, but it actually is distance
• The forecast and current Hurricane condition color on the map -> based on category (green - red)

We've added:
• Hurricane Pressure information
• Hurricane Sea Quadrants -> 12-foot wave height information
• Past Hurricane condition color on the map to Grey

New: WEATHER ALERTS!
Get informed about extreme weather conditions! Receive a notification at the moment that your location is at risk for dangerous weather. Take timely measures to be save! Access detailed information and keep track of real time weather conditions.

Thank you for using NOAA Radar! In this update we have tweaked the presentation on the App Store

New: WEATHER ALERTS!
Get informed about extreme weather conditions! Receive a notification at the moment that your location is at risk for dangerous weather. Take timely measures to be save! Access detailed information and keep track of real time weather conditions.
• This version contains a bug fix which caused the app to crash on iOS 8

Thank you for using NOAA Radar! 
• This version contains minor bug fixes
• We've fixed the snow and rain values; it's now showing the correct precipitation.
• We've improved the accuracy of the search results and the indicators on the map
• We've fixed a bug which caused problems with the weather forecast and different timezones
• For some locations it was still not possible to change between timezones, which has now been fixed
• Thank you for using Weather Radar NOAA! This version contains minor bug fixes
• We've updated the screenshots on the App Store

Do you have your device set on Dark Mode? Then Weather Radar NOAA will follow that preference!

Stay informed during hurricane season!
Track heavy storms, hurricanes, & severe weather conditions.
See the hurricanes predicted path, intensity, wind speed, and much more.
+ Fixed a few minor bugs

Receive Extreme Weather Alerts notifications when your added locations are at risk.
Note: Detailed information can also be viewed by simply tapping on the weather activity on the radar map.

Curious about Air Quality? Easily check the amount of air pollution and composition.
Note: To enable it, toggle it on in the settings tab, then tap on the forecast tab, and you will then see the AQI in the top right corner.

Check out the Frequently Asked Questions to find all the info you need.
FAQ: In the app Settings you can find the answers to your questions and general information.

Thanks for your positive feedback!
